parameter.value: Ola |PLAYERNAME|. ! I can take you to {Yalahar} (100 gps), {New Island} (100gps), {Thais} (100gps), {Svargrond} (100gps), Carlin} (100gps), {Edron} (100gps), {Ankrahmun} (100gps), {Venore} ( 100gps), {Port Hope} (100gps) or {Ilha dos Eventos} (100gps). Where do you want to go?
Is |TOTALCOST| gold coins too much for you? Get out of here!
